name: TradeMark Media
tagline: Delight with Design. Transport with Technology.
description:
TradeMark Media is a design, branding, and marketing company in Austin, Texas.
TradeMark partners with organizations to create online experiences that are engaging, effortless, and effective.  
Founded in 1999 by Nick Weynand, TradeMark now employees nearly 30 full-time staffers in nearly every discipline—branding, user experience design, web development, SEO and online marketing, and content strategy and copywriting.
